content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Greetings, Baihu Li. Thank you for considering my apartment. I believe we can come to an agreement on the rental price. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Can you give me a proposal?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible rental price. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am willing to offer you a rental price of €500 per month. This is a fair price for the apartment and should be sufficient for your needs. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can you lower the price?
I can pay €350 per month.

TERMINATE
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I apologize for not being able to meet your needs. However, based on the size and location of the apartment, the rental price of €350 per month is not feasible for me as a landlord. I would like to suggest a rental price of €500 per month as a fair compromise. Would you be willing to consider this price?
name: Heinrich Heine
